text.section: Boats exempt from registration may be required by the department to apply for an official identification number to be displayed in accordance with KRS 235.110.

law.history: Amended 1980 Ky. Acts ch. 295, sec. 79, effective July 15, 1980. -- Amended 1978 Ky. Acts ch. 263, sec. 14, effective June 17, 1978. -- Amended 1974 Ky. Acts ch. 292, sec. 16. -- Created 1960 Ky. Acts ch. 68, Art. VIII, sec. 23, effective March 17, 1960.
